query.value: @concat('select coalesce(cast(max(load_date) as date), ''1900-01-01'') as last_fetched_date from `hrcm-data-catalog`.audit.audit_log where data_source = ''', pipeline().parameters.datasource, ''' and table_name = ''', pipeline().parameters.tablename, '''')

@concat('select coalesce(cast(max(load_date) as date), ''1900-01-01'') as last_fetched_date from `hrcm-data-catalog`.audit.audit_log where data_source = ''', pipeline().parameters.datasource, ''' and table_name = ''', pipeline().parameters.tablename, '''')

@concat('select coalesce(cast(max(loaddate) as date), ''1900-01-01'') as last_fetched_date from audit.load_logs where data_source = ''', item().datasource, ''' and tablename = ''', item().tablename, '''')
